full_summary:
# **Stage 2: Administration Building Parking Lot (Yoho National Park)**

### Project Overview

Parks Canada seeks a contractor to design and construct a new parking lot adjacent to the Yoho Administration Building in Field, BC, Yoho National Park. The scope of work entails:

*   Demolition and excavation of existing playground and fencing
*   Construction of new asphalt parking area
*   Installation of a cast-in-place concrete accessibility ramp and stairs
*   Installation of canopies and associated electrical infrastructure

### Two-Stage Solicitation Process

This tender announcement constitutes the Stage 2 of a two-stage solicitation process. The first stage assessed the qualifications of interested suppliers. Invited suppliers have been selected and will be permitted to provide a financial bid based on the provided specifications and drawings.
